name: Jump on Mars
description:
This my first game I made with Game Maker Studio.

It's a action - platformer game with grafics and sounds which I made on my own. I used tutorials from Tasty Blue Games, a german YouTuber (here's the link to his chanal: https://www.youtube.com/user/TyrogreMusic), as an example.

I hope you enjoy playing and please leave a comment!

[Updated Version]
